resources.string: YOU FOOL \nMade by Danelc\nPlease choose a room to join:

*Welcome to a quick introduction to the rules of YouFool!
*on the start menu please choose a room to join and a nickname (optionally) before connecting
*after connecting you can wait for up to 3 more players to join that same room or just click the ForceStart button on the top
*when the game starts you will be able to see an incomplete phrase with only one right answer
*and you should complete in a way that other player will be certain that's your answer is the right one
*after every player submitted his answer a couple of buttons should appear with all the players Lies and one which is the truth
*your job is to find the truth in between all of the lies
*after all the choices were made a showcase will star showing off each Lie with who fell for it and became a fool
*from here we get a new phrase and start all over again!
